title: Content Types
description: Valid content types for page content blocks (config.page_content.content_type column).

type.description: Content type identifier stored in the database.

requires_table_config.description: Whether this content type needs a table_config_id reference.

requires_form.description: Whether this content type needs a form_id reference.

supports_children.description: Whether this content type can contain nested child content blocks.

default.name: Table
default.description: Data table widget powered by a table config. Displays paginated, sortable, filterable rows with column formatting.

default.name: Form
default.description: Data entry form for creating or editing entity records.

default.name: Chart
default.description: Data visualization widget (line, bar, pie, KPI, etc.) powered by a table config with metrics and group_by aggregation.

default.name: Tabs
default.description: Tabbed container that organizes child content blocks into switchable tab panes.

default.name: Container
default.description: Layout container for grouping child content blocks in a grid, flex, stack, accordion, or section layout.

default.name: Text
default.description: Static text or markdown content block for labels, instructions, or section headers.
